items.titolo: Micron addresses Crucial exit backlash: 'We are trying to help consumers around the world' — company warns that DRAM drought could last until at least 2028
items.descrizione: Micron has responded to criticism over its decision to exit the consumer memory business and warns that shortages may last until 2028.
